original_text: Speak unto the children of Israel, and say unto them, Concerning the feasts of the Lord, which ye shall proclaim to be holy convocations, even these are my feasts.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 이르라 이것이 나의 절기들이니 너희가 성회로 공포할 여호와의 절기들이니라

sentences.original_text: Speak unto the children of Israel
Concerning the feasts of the Lord
which ye shall proclaim to be holy convocations
